title: 04/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/02/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best Of The Herd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--lays out San Francisco head coach Kyle Shanahan's greatest challenge yet. Also, Washington Football Team head coach Ron Rivera's plan to build a winner. Plus, the New England Patriots' next big move. Finally, two-time NBA champion and former Gonzaga All-American Adam Morrison.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
